update.releaseNotes: v.4.9.3 FIXED - Minor bugfixes. ADDED - Devices can now have combination of LED/RELAYS and Sensors on same device (SetOption68 0 required) ADDED - Devices can now have multiple PWM devices/RELAYS and Sensors on same device (SetOption68 1 required) ADDED - Home Screen Widget can now switch LED and PWM relays. ADDED - Scenes can now switch LED and PWM relays.
